page.title: TU Graz DMP Tool
page.description: TU Graz DMP Tool is a software solution to create machine actionable Data Management Plans (maDMPs) based on the open source solution DAMAP. DAMAP was developed by the RDM Team in collaboration with TU Wien and it is under continuous improvement.

contentMap.support: The page is intended to provide support for the use of the TU Graz DMP Tool. If you have a question or request about the DMP Tool (e.g. permission control, templates) please contact us.

faq.firstQuestion: What is allowed to create new DMPs in the TU Graz DMP Tool?
faq.firstAnswer: Anyone with a TU Graz account (students, employees, external project staff).
faq.secondQuestion: Are my DMPs visible to everyone inside and outside of TU Graz?
faq.secondAnswer: No, by default, the viewing and editing rights are yours. However, you can give members of the TU Graz editing options for your DMP.
faq.thirdQuestion: How long will my DMPs be stored?
faq.thirdAnswer: At least for 10 years, but even after that, your DMPs are not automatically deleted.
faq.fourthQuestion: Will I have to pay if I use the DMP Tool?
faq.fourthAnswer: No, you don't have to pay anything to use it.
faq.fifthAnswer: Yes, if you know that you no longer want to keep the DMP in the DMP Tool, you can delete it yourself at any time.
faq.sixthQuestion: Where is the DMP stored and is it safe there?
faq.sixthAnswer: The DMPs are stored on the servers of the ZID of TU Graz and are protected by their security measures.
